+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Term                 | Description                                                                      |
+======================+==================================================================================+
| Emulation            | Process that imitates a specific behaviour specified in the emulation type, over |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Emulation type       | An emulation can be of the following types:  * Contentiousness  * Maliciousness  |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Resource type        | A resource can be of the following types:  * CPU  * MEM  * IO  * NET             |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Emulator             | Specific mechanism/tool that is used to create an emulation type. For example    |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Distribution         | In the case of contention, it is a discrete function of a specific resource type |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Distribution         | Number of runs for the distribution                                              |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Emulation lifetime   | Duration of the emulation                                                        |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Run                  | Basic emulator instantiation                                                     |
+----------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
